resources.string: A 15.6-inch Anti-Glare, wide-view display gaming laptop powered by Core i5/Core i7 processor coupled with Intel HM175 and GeForce GTX GPU.
15.6 inches Resolusi 1920 x 1080 Tipe Panel Anti-Glare
Dimensi 38.4 x 26.2 x 2.3 cm (WxDxH) Berat 2.5 kg
CPU Core i5 , Core i7 Model Prosesor i5-7300HQ i7-7700HQ Chipset Intel HM175 Express Chipset Model GPU NVIDIA with 3GB/6GB GDDR5 VRAM GeForce GTX 1060 NVIDIA with 2GB/4GB GDDR5 VRAM GeForce GTX 1050

RAM 32GB Tipe Memori DDR4 SDRAM Kecepatan Memori 2400MHz Memori Tambahan up to 32 GB Tipe Penyimpanan HDD+SSD/eMMC , SSHD HDD 1TB , 2TB Kecepatan Rotasi 5400 rpm , 7200 rpm SSD/eMMC 128GB , 256GB , 512GB
Ethernet 10/100/1000 Base T WiFi Integrated 802.11 AC (2x2)
HDMI , USB3.0 , Bluetooth , Card Reader , Camera , Speakers , Microphone , 10 key , USB Type-C , USB3.1
OS Windows 10 OS Ver Windows 10 Pro Windows 10 Home
